entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
